savevtk.comment: Creates VTK files with Zsurf for each PART (default=false)

remove.comment: Removes particles above the Zsurf limit (default=false)

meshdata.comment: Zsurf data from mesh-data file (CSV or binary).

initialtime.comment: Defines the initial time of mesh data (default=0)

setpos.comment: Applies a position offset to the mesh data (default=0,0,0)
